questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and missing report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/ECG 9108/VIDEO FOR CHECKING THE WALLOUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING THE WALLOUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/ECG 9108/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CONTINUITY.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CONTINUITY

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check the continuity of fuse and confirm whether the fuse is blown.
replace the fuse with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether AC Voltage of 230 is available.
check for any carbon formation / breakage of input pin connector.
clean / replace the input pin connector

videos.videoName: Video for replacing input pin connector

questions.question: check for any loose connection / breakage of cable from input pin connector to power supply board.
reseat / replace the cables accordingly
check and confirm whether the power supply output voltage is available.
replace / repair the control board accordingly
repair / replace the power supply board accordingly
Check and confirm is there any muscle interference in the ECG.
cross check the cables and confirm whether the cables are defective.
replace the cables with a new one
check the cable pin connector for any damage / breakage of pins.
replace the cable pin connector with a new one
check and confirm whether there is a proper grounding at the socket.
shift the equipment to another where proper grounding is available.
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether there is a straight in the ECG print.
cross check the cables and confirm whether the cables are defective.
replace the cables with a new one
check the cable pin connector for any damage / breakage of pins.
replace the cable pin connector with a new one
repair / replace the ECG module accordingly
check and confirm whether the paper is rolling during ECG is taken.
check and confirm whether the paper roll is placed properly
place the paper roll properly
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether there is any dust / any obstructions in the gears
clean the gears carefully
check for any breakage or damage of gears.
replace the printer drive with a new one
motor is defective, replace the motor with a new one
check and confirm whether there is partial print or dull ECG print.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the thermal head with a soft cloth and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the thermal head with a new one
check and confirm whether there is no print out during the ECG is taken.
check whether the paper is placed properly and 45.
place the paper roll properly
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable from printer to control board
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the buttons does not respond while operating.
, open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connections / breakage of cable from switch control board to control board
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace / repair the switch control board accordingly
: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call
